message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you this product for $100. Unfortunately, I don't have any additional information to share about its quality, but I assure you that it meets our standard specifications. Would you like to purchase it?
Hello Alice, since I don't have any information about the product's quality and there's a 66.67% chance of it being low quality, I'll pass on this one. I'm looking forward to the next round.

Hi Bob, I understand your decision in the previous round. For this new product, I can tell you that it has been properly inspected and meets all the required standards. However, I must admit that it doesn't have any standout features. Would you like to take a chance on it for $100?

Hi Alice, I appreciate the additional information, but the fact that it meets the standards and doesn't have any standout features doesn't change the probability of it being high or low quality for me. I'll pass on this one as well, as the expected value is still less than the price.

Given the unchanged probability of it being high or low quality, I'll pass on this one as well.
